name: ai-agentic-boardroom
description: AI-powered executive boardroom simulation with sophisticated C-level agents for strategic discussions
author: AI Boardroom Team

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:update
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run changelog && npm run version:tag
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run changelog && npm run version:tag
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run changelog && npm run version:tag
